busqueda-p1: AlfonOS is a functional operating system that combines the main features of a traditional OS and showcases information about its creator, "Alfonso Rincón." Throughout your exploration, you will discover the mysteries it holds.
f-5: Terminal with commands and Easter Eggs
ia-p: Hello, I’m AI-fon, and I’m here to solve your problems. If you have any questions about the creator of this website, or about the functionalities of this OS, don’t hesitate to ask me.
proyectos-p: You can find all the projects inside the folder located on the left side of the desktop.
experiencia-1-1: >> Development of a complete CRM with JavaFX over 3 months
codezen-descripcion: is a mobile application designed for programmers that aims to improve productivity, well-being, and daily habits. It integrates habit tracking tools, project management, meditation, and an achievements system that motivates personal and professional growth for developers.
crm-descripcion: CRM developed in Java with JavaFX and MySQL, created together with a classmate during DAM practices. It allows managing users, clients, and tasks with a simple and functional interface. The project is educational and demonstrative, with no references to real companies, and showcases the programming and database skills acquired.
flappy-descripcion:
Flappy Parfums is an Android game inspired by the classic Flappy Bird, where the traditional characters are replaced by iconic perfumes. It was developed by a team using Android Studio with Java.

The player must tap the screen to keep their perfume in the air and avoid obstacles shaped like pipes. As the score increases, new characters can be unlocked, such as Phantom, Azzaro, or Stronger, each with its own animation.
